climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Luxury Plush Material: The luxury fiber pillows are crafted in super plush microfiber ! They are expertly tailored to ensure maximum comfort for all sleeping positions.The pillow top covers are made of High-quality Microfiber fabric material. It's soft and cooling.

Fluffy & Support: Filled with 100% microfiber similar to down which makes the pillows supportive and cozy. Whether you prefer soft or firm pillows, our comfortable cooling pillows are for you. 800 GSM Filling makes pillows extremely fluffy.Our 2 pack bed pillows provide a great balance of supple softness and plump firmness. They will give you great support for your neck and shoulder,they are suitable for side, stomach, and back sleepers.

NO-SHIFT Construction: With no-shift construction, you'll have a comfortable sleep experience throughout the night. You’ll fall asleep fast and sleep like on a cloud. It is highly recommended as a best gift for your parents, family and friends. They give superior comfort against your skin without extra heat and sweat all night.

Easy to care: Our queen pillows come vacuum-sealed for shipping, once opened it will start to fluff up. Please leave 24 hours for the pillows to get to full thickness before using them. Our Pillows are machine washable with tumble dry low. Please do not iron or dry clean.

High Quality: Buy with confidence! We are convinced our high quality fluffy pillows will exceed your expectations. Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority. If you have any questions, please contact us, you can choose to exchange for a new pair or a full refund, we will spare no effort to assist you to solve any problem!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great for everyone Good Pillows to Getting Restful Sleep Now the pace of urban life and work is accelerating, so we must ensure the quality of sheep, improve the quality of deep sleep every night. We should choose POZINO bed pillows to provide a comfortable and healthy deep sleep, to fully relax.The soft and powerful support of POZINO breathable pillow brings you and your family the ultimate comfortable sleep. Take care fo the sound sleep of you and your family all night.

The pillows are suitable for all sleeping positions. They are soft enough for back sleeping yet provides enough support for side sleeping. No matter waht position you sleep in, this pillow supports you.Our pillows are soft, breathable, and supportive. They adjust to your unique size and sleep position for restorative sleep.The fibers in the compress and conform to your sleep habit. POZION provides the perfect leverl of support for a restful night's sleep and discover how comfortable the right pillow can be! Sleep like a baby is starting from POZINO pillows.

Please use the following steps to make the pillow fluffy: Take the pillow out from the vacuum-compressed package.Unwrap and fluff it up manually to its full size by kneading/slapping and shaking.Wait about 30 minutes for the best use of the pillows.The pillow will be fully fluffed after 48-72 hours. You also can pat it for a quick fluff. TIPS: It's Packaged in a Vacuum Bag, Please spread It for a Few Days Before Use So It Would Return to Normal Thickness.Best Way Fluffy Again: Lay It in the Sun for a Few Hours. Washing Instructions: Do not bleach and iron.Water wash ( max temperature 30℃).Machine wash in the gentle cycle with cold water and sun dry or tumble dry on low when need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bed Pillows for Sleeping Queen Size 2 Pack Cooling Pillow Set of 2, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase! These pillows not only come at a great cost but also provide exceptional comfort.First and foremost, the cost of this pillow set is truly a steal. I was pleasantly surprised by the affordability without compromising on quality. It's a fantastic value for getting two pillows in one package, perfect for upgrading both sides of the bed or having a spare pillow for guests.When it comes to comfort, these pillows really hit the mark. The down alternative filling offers a luxurious softness that cradles my head and neck perfectly. Whether I sleep on my side, back, or stomach, these pillows provide the right amount of support and plushness, ensuring a restful night's sleep.What sets these pillows apart is their cooling feature. As someone who tends to get warm during the night, I appreciate the cooling technology that helps regulate temperature and keeps me comfortable throughout the night. No more tossing and turning due to overheating!The Queen size is perfect for my bed, and the set of two pillows allows me to have a consistent sleeping experience. The pillows also retain their shape well, even after extended use. I've had them for a while now, and they still provide the same level of comfort as when I first got them.In terms of quality, these pillows are impressive. The stitching is sturdy, and the materials used are durable, ensuring that these pillows will last for a long time. Additionally, they are easy to care for, as they are machine washable and maintain their shape and softness even after washing.Overall, I highly recommend the Bed Pillows for Sleeping Queen Size 2 Pack Cooling Pillow Set of 2. With their excellent cost, superior comfort, and cooling feature, they are a fantastic investment for a good night's sleep. Say goodbye to restless nights and hello to the luxurious comfort of these pillows!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these pillows
reviews.reviewText: These are the best pillows I've ever had! I have gotten the best sleep since using them. I've had them for 4 months and they are not flat, I've bought many pillows that claim to not go flat but do within weeks. These are super soft and comfortable. I plan on ordering more because my husband keeps stealing them from me lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the price! Soft, not firm. Pillow is well stuffed. I will sleep good on these! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality pillow
reviews.reviewText: I love these pillows, they are soft but yet sturdy as well. They are going to last for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm and oh so comfy
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t know how much I needed new pillows until I had surgery and was in bed a week.I ordered 4 of these pillows and I’m going to order some for my daughters wish I could give more than 5 stars ⭐️’s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are not as fluffy as they appear in the photo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So soft and cooling if part gets hot I switch to other side! I got 2 for me 2 for my son. Actually I put under me too I felt like sleeping on clouds!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cannot tell you how many pillows I thought would work for me. I like these because they are supportive and not too firm or bulky. I'm a tummy sleeper and these have been the best pillows for a good nights sleep. I have neck issues, so these seem to be the ticket after buying and tossing pillows that don't work for me. Very happy with them and will continue to order in the future.
These pillows are terrible. Very flat, no support at all. They feel so cheap. Don’t waste your money. Returns are very hard too.
